languages.text: "Это честь для меня". {n}Лицо Соломона непроницаемо хмуро. Он подает вам твердую ладонь, покрытую мозолями от оружейной рукояти.{/n}
"It would be my honour." {n}Solomorne's face is an impenetrable glower. He takes your hand, his palm firm and covered with calluses from his weapon grip.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Это честь для меня". {n}Лицо Соломона непроницаемо хмуро. Он подает вам твердую ладонь, покрытую мозолями от оружейной рукояти.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "It would be my honour." {n}Solomorne's face is an impenetrable glower. He takes your hand, his palm firm and covered with calluses from his weapon hilt.{/n}
"It would be my honour." {n}Solomorne's face is an impenetrable glower. He takes your hand, his palm firm and covered with calluses from his weapon hilt.{/n}
"It would be my honour." {n}Solomorne's face is an impenetrable glower. He takes your hand, his palm firm and covered with calluses from his weapon hilt.{/n}
"It would be my honour." {n}Solomorne's face is an impenetrable glower. He takes your hand, his palm firm and covered with calluses from his weapon grip.{/n}
"It would be my honour." {n}Solomorne's face is an impenetrable glower. He takes your hand, his palm firm and covered with calluses from his weapon grip.{/n}

languages.text: "Es wäre mir eine Ehre." {n}Solomornes Miene ist finster, undurchdringlich. Er nimmt deine Hand. Seine Handfläche ist fest und voller Schwielen vom Griff seiner Waffe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It would be my honour." {n}Solomorne's face is an impenetrable glower. He takes your hand, his palm firm and covered with calluses from his weapon grip.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es wäre mir eine Ehre." {n}Solomornes Miene ist finster, undurchdringlich. Er nimmt deine Hand. Seine Handfläche ist fest und voller Schwielen vom Griff seiner Waffe.{/n}

languages.text: « Ce serait un honneur. » {n}L'expression impénétrable de Solomorne semble toujours aussi sévère. Lorsqu'il vous prend la main, vous sentez les callosités qui couvrent sa paume à force de tenir une arme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It would be my honour." {n}Solomorne's face is an impenetrable glower. He takes your hand, his palm firm and covered with calluses from his weapon grip.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ce serait un honneur. » {n}L'expression impénétrable de Solomorne semble toujours aussi sévère. Lorsqu'il vous prend la main, vous sentez les callosités qui couvrent sa paume à force de tenir une arme.{/n}

languages.text: 「光栄です」{n}ソロモーンの表情は読めないほど険しく、しかめっ面を崩さなかった。彼はあなたの手を取った。その掌は武器の柄で鍛えられた、固くてタコだらけのものだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It would be my honour." {n}Solomorne's face is an impenetrable glower. He takes your hand, his palm firm and covered with calluses from his weapon grip.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「光栄です」{n}ソロモーンの表情は読めないほど険しく、しかめっ面を崩さなかった。彼はあなたの手を取った。その掌は武器の柄で鍛えられた、固くてタコだらけのものだった。{/n}

languages.text: «Será un honor». {n}La mirada de Solomorne es inescrutable y amenazadora. Al sujetar tu mano, notas los callos causados por empuñar su arma y la firmeza de su agarre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It would be my honour." {n}Solomorne's face is an impenetrable glower. He takes your hand, his palm firm and covered with calluses from his weapon grip.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Será un honor». {n}La mirada de Solomorne es inescrutable y amenazadora. Al sujetar tu mano, notas los callos causados por empuñar su arma y la firmeza de su agarre.{/n}

languages.text: “这是我的荣幸。”{n}索罗蒙毫无表情的脸上怒意更盛。他握着你的手，他的手掌很有力，布满了握枪时留下的老茧。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It would be my honour." {n}Solomorne's face is an impenetrable glower. He takes your hand, his palm firm and covered with calluses from his weapon grip.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这是我的荣幸。”{n}索罗蒙毫无表情的脸上怒意更盛。他握着你的手，他的手掌很有力，布满了握枪时留下的老茧。{/n}

languages.text: "Şeref duyarım." {n}Solomorne'un yüzü nedense birden asılıyor. Elini sert, silahının kabzasını tutmaktan nasırlaşmış ellerinin arasına alıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It would be my honour." {n}Solomorne's face is an impenetrable glower. He takes your hand, his palm firm and covered with calluses from his weapon grip.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Şeref duyarım." {n}Solomorne'un yüzü nedense birden asılıyor. Elini sert, silahının kabzasını tutmaktan nasırlaşmış ellerinin arasına alıyor.{/n}
